learners.models package¶

Submodules¶

learners.models.model module¶

class learners.models.model.BaseModel[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstract base class for learner model

Defines necessary operations for the underlying learner model; training, prediction, classification probabilities, and decision function results. In order for an initial or improved learner to use a future-defined model, the model must include these operations

decision_function_adversary(instances)[source]¶

Use the model to determine the decision function for each instance.

Parameters:instances (List[Instance]) – training or test instances.
Returns:decision values (List(int))
get_alg()[source]¶

Return the underlying model algorithm.

Returns:algorithm used to train and test instances

Returns:label classifications (List(int))
predict_proba_adversary(instances)[source]¶

Use the model to determine probability of adversarial classification.

Returns:probability of adversarial classification (List(int))

Parameters:params (Dict) – set of available params with updated values

learners.models.sklearner module¶

class learners.models.sklearner.Model(sklearn_object)[source]¶

Bases: learners.models.model.BaseModel

Learner model wrapper around sklearn classifier

Extends the BaseModel class to use the functionality of a user-supplied sklearn classifier in conjunction with the adversarial library.

decision_function_adversary(instances)[source]¶

Use the model to determine the decision function for each instance.

Parameters:instances (List[Instance]) or (Instance) – training or test instances.
Returns:decision values (List(int))
get_alg()[source]¶

Return the underlying model algorithm.

Returns:algorithm used to train and test instances
get_available_params() → typing.Dict[source]¶

Get the set of params defined in the model usage.

These are generated by the sklearn module.

Returns:dictionary mapping param names to current values
predict(instances)[source]¶

Predict classification labels for the set of instances using the predict function of the sklearn classifier.

Parameters:instances (List[Instance]) or (Instance) – training or test instances.
Returns:label classifications (List(int))
predict_proba(instances)[source]¶

Use the model to determine probability of adversarial classification.

Parameters:instances (List[Instance]) or (Instance) – training or test instances.
Returns:probability of adversarial classification (List(int))
set_params(params: typing.Dict)[source]¶

Set params for the model.

Parameters:params (Dict) – set of available params with updated values
train(instances: typing.List[data_reader.input.Instance])[source]¶

Train on the set of training instances using the underlying sklearn object.

Parameters:instances (List[Instance]) – training instances.
